name: Drift Car Parking
description:
Control your modern Sports car with an on-screen steering wheel, acceleration and brake.

This is a challenging game in which you have a city environment and off road environment and you have to find the car parking area and park your car with in given time limit and you can only collide for limited time. There are various cars and obstacles in the parking area.You have to avoid to collide with the cars and the obstacles and park your car to increase your score.

Features:
- City & Off Road environment
- Realistic Controls.
- HD Graphics.
- Awsome sound effects.
- Varoius Exciting levels with increasing difficulties.
